4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Maimunah bint Al-Harith, the wife of the Prophet (ﷺ), said:"When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) performed Ghusl from Janabah, he would start by washing his hands, then he would pour water with his right hand onto his left and wash his private part, then he would strike his hand on the ground then wipe it then wash it. Then he would perform Wudu' as for prayer, then he would pour water on his head and all of his body. Then he would move and wash his feet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَسْحِ الْيَدِ بِالأَرْضِ بَعْدَ غَسْلِ الْفَرْجِ
chapter.eng-name: Wiping The Hand On The Ground After Washing The Private Parts
